---
name: TDH3_promoter
creator: keoni
description: S. cerevisiae TDH3 promoter
prefix: TACA
suffix: AACT
sequence: 
---

Promoter region of the TDH3 gene encoding glyceraldehyde-3-phosphate dehydrogenase in S. cerevisiae. This promoter provides very strong constitutive expression and is one of the most powerful promoters available in yeast.
